com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.gif

Class GifDrawableEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.load.resource.gif.GifDrawableEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encoder<Resource<GifDrawable>>, ResourceEncoder<GifDrawable>

    public class GifDrawableEncoder
extends Object
implements ResourceEncoder<GifDrawable>
    Writes the original bytes of a GifDrawable to an OutputStream.
